name: PACKISM Clear Makeup Bag - TSA Approved Toiletry Bag for Carry-on & Checked Luggage, Water Resistant Car Storage Organizer with Reinforced Seams
product_description: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Q: ARE THESE BAGS TSA APPROVED FOR CARRY-ON? A: The Medium bag (7.5 x 2.2 x 5.5 inches) follows the TSA 3-1-1 liquids rule for carry-on luggage. The Large bag (9.7 x 3.2 x 6.5 inches) is designed for checked luggage or larger items that do not need to pass through the liquids screening. Q: CAN I USE THIS AS A CAR CONSOLE ORGANIZER? A: Yes. Both the flexible PVC and structured versions fit in most center consoles and glove boxes—ideal for sunglasses, charging cables, and other small essentials. Q: HOW DO I REMOVE THE PLASTIC SMELL UPON ARRIVAL? A: The bag comes with a deodorizing packet. If a scent remains, we recommend wiping the bag with a damp cloth and letting it air out in a ventilated area for 24 to 48 hours. Q: IS THE MATERIAL HARD OR SOFT? A: The soft PVC version is made of thick, flexible PVC, so it’s soft and collapsible. The structured version includes a built-in hard frame with PU leather–trimmed edges. Q: IS THE LEATHER REAL OR SYNTHETIC? A: This bag is crafted from high-quality PU (Polyurethane) leather, offering a durable, water-resistant, and cruelty-free alternative with a stylish textured finish.

name: Extra Large Weekly Pill Organizer Set, Reusable Pill Bags with 14 Coded Pouches for Home and Travel, 7 Day with AM PM Large Storage Portable Medicine Pill Case for Fish Oils, Vitamins
short_description: 【3x More Capacity Than Standard Pill Organizers】Tired of running out of space? This 7-day pill organizer features 14 large pouches, offering triple the capacity of standard AM/PM pill boxes. Each compartment easily fits 40 fish oil capsules or 60 vitamins.

【14 Detachable Zippered Pouch Compartments】It comes with 14 individual large zippered pouches in 7 different colors, making it easy to sort by day of the week. Each pouch has a reusable labeling area for your custom categorization. If you use a dry-erase marker, wiping it clean is a breeze. These pouches snap securely into a row of locking rings—staying firmly in place yet easy to remove when needed. The colorful design also helps you keep track of your daily dosage.

【Hard-Shell EVA for Superior Pill Protection】This travel pill organizer is crafted from high-quality reinforced EVA material, boasting excellent compression resistance to effectively prevent pills from crushing or damage. The binder-style design features six sturdy metal rings that securely hold each pill pouch in place. The outer case, complete with a zipper and handle, feels both durable and lightweight. Perfect for keeping your medications organized, dry, and safe while traveling.

【Waterproof & Easy to Clean 】This travel pill organizer offers ample storage space—perfect for stowing medications while easily fitting small items like earrings, jewelry, and buttons. It features a removable internal binder: ideal for holding pill pouches, yet detachable to free up extra room. The entire inner core detaches effortlessly, allowing for quick, thorough cleaning that reaches every nook and cranny.

【Privacy Protection】This pill travel case features a stylish and simple square design, Its compact dimensions (6.7 inches x 4.7 inches x 2.3 inches). The opaque shell not only effectively protects your medication privacy and avoids awkward or curious looks. Whether for daily use or travel, it can quietly blend into your personal style, making health management both reassuring and tasteful.
